latest.title: Jukebox Update!
latest.description: **IchiBot** got a new major update ~nya! It has to do with the Jukebox, plus a few bugfixes and optimizations.

fields.name: __[a|b], [h|r] and now [j]__
fields.value: A third parameter has now been implemented - `j|jukebox`. Upload new tracks using this tag, and they will exclusively be saved for the Jukebox.

fields.name: __Jukebox Playback Modes!__
fields.value: Replacing the quick exit, you can now toggle the Jukebox's playback behavior to play in order, repeat, shuffle, or only play once.
Enjoy the update, and please report any bugs ~nya!
